_sText: awp_blue_arena_v1 This is one of my first maps, just never released it. It's a small map but features a custom blue theme. Just as fun as every other map. Features -HDR -env_sun -Detailed lighting -Custom blue textures -Shadow Control -Cell Shading -Custom start up cameras -Level Fade In Install 1) Download to your desktop 2) Right click and extract to the following location C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\accountnamer\counter-strike source\cstrike 3) Start CS:S and enjoy Please leave some feedback!
